subject: Fwd: Order of Australia Association Symbol
preview: Hi Karen,    We have lived the new home page. Regarding Anthony's email, we have removed it from his bio. Actually we did this when you first requested it. Please let us know if it's anywhere we have

full_threads.body:
Hi Karen, 


We have lived the new home page. Regarding Anthony's email, we have removed it from his bio. Actually we did this when you first requested it. Please let us know if it's anywhere we have missed? 


Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire I've already removed it previously.. I've removed it from Anthony's bio page, which other page do we need to remove it from?
Joao Henriques or Joel Maligalig can one of you please tackle this> Cheers.

Hi Karen, 


Sure, will do and update you once done. 


Thanks and speak soon,

Thanks Heath - I took a look and much better so please put into production. Can you also please remove Anthony’s email address link at the same time?


Best regards

Karen

Sent from my iPhone


On 14 Aug 2018, at 11:29 am, Heath from WP Perk <heath@wpperk.com> wrote:

Hi Karen,

We have updated the new version of the home page:

https://www.bellpartners.com/home-temporary-31-07-2018/

Password: oam

Please let me know if this is what you had in mind?

Thanks and speak soon,
Fwd: Order of Australia Association Symbol
Joel Maligalig Wow! That was quick!! I thought you were having lunch :)
Heath Maguire Joao Henriques  All done Cheers!
Joao Henriques if you have a look at the live home page, it's all beautiful and lined up, so I suspect there's a conflict. All good no rush. Cheers
Heath Maguire I think it's been always like this...I'll have a look but probably we will need Joel the magician to fix it when he comes back from lunch :)
lololololololololol!
Actually Joao Henriques Joao Henriques the match height on the boxes in the attached images don't seem to be working? Cheers,

Hi Karen, 


Sure, we have fixed up the mobile view now too. Let me know if and when you want us to transfer this to the live home page. 


Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire It's all good now Heath, Joel did his magic :)
Heath Maguire I'll ask Joel what he thinks it can work here. Cheers
Joao Henriques can you please look into this one. Cheers

Thanks Heath - this looks really good. Only comment is that on my mobile it’s hard to see all of the pop up and navigate up and down. Can you see that also?


Best regards

Karen

Hi Karen, 


We have updated the new version of the home page: 


https://www.bellpartners.com/home-temporary-31-07-2018/


Password: oam  


Please let me know if this is what you had in mind? 


Thanks and speak soon,
Joao Henriques can you please action the above updates on the temp home page you created? Cheers

Hi Heath


You are right that I missed this email somehow. Sorry. It looks good. A couple of points:


1. He got an Order of Australia Medal (not association) so wording should be changed to reflect that

2. I have attached a pic of the actual medal from the official website as it would be good to use this

3. I have also attached the wording from the offical website on what Anthony received it for - it’s short but a good summary and consistent with official wording. The link should probably go to that rather than Ants bio.

4. As per my previous email, we should add OAM under his name and remove the email address.





Best regards

Karen
Help Heath understand how they’re doing:

Hi Karen, 


We have created a staging copy of the home page here: https://www.bellpartners.com/home-temporary-31-07-2018/ so that you can preview the OAM section. You will need to enter the password: oam to preview it. 


Once you land on Anthony's page, we will also add the OAM after his name. 


Let me know what you think? 


Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire  link: https://www.bellpartners.com/home-temporary-31-07-2018/
pass: oam
Fwd: Order of Australia Association Symbol
